item.title: ANZ, BNZ and Westpac follow ASB by lifting mortgage rates

ANZ, BNZ and Westpac have followed the lead of ASB in bringing an end to the downward trend in interest rates.

item.title: Live: 'No farmers, no food' - Huge turnout as tractors, utes take to cities
item.description:
Trucks, utes and even dogs will descend on city centres around the country today, as farmers take part in a huge protest.
The Howl of a Protest event, organised by Groundswell New Zealand, will see ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz
